topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540a8f986368720629d30100#post_540a8f986368720629d30100
Actually I'm gonna go ahead and say they aren't. There is a reason so many people do them, and that is because drugs do what they fukken advertize.

Granted once you go beyond weed, booze and acid they also do a lot of stuff they don't advertize that fuck up your life good, but the three I listed? I say do them in moderation and you'll have one hell of a fucking weekend.

Full disclosure: I've tried a lot of weird shit over the years, and I have had some hella bad times on drugs. I'm talking nightmarish "OH SHIT I'M GONNA DIE!" times in which my monitor grew a face and told me to kill myself while listing all the things I'm most ashamed of and that I wake up in a cold sweat thinking of. (This was the one time I tried shrooms and had the worst trip ever.)

But I've also had some great fucking times on drugs. Mostly pot or booze.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
